description.value:
You appear larger and stronger to nearby creatures, appearing to possess threatening features like antlers, claws, or poison to their senses. Each non-allied creature in the area must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}. This condition doesn't decrease at the end of its turn if it damaged you during that turn.

Failure As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3}.
